com.gmail.etordera.jcms

Class IccProfile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gmail.etordera.jcms.IccProfile

  • public class IccProfile
extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of an ICC color profile.

    This class uses native LittleCMS C library for managing ICC profile data, and may allocate resources that will not be automatically freed by JVM's garbage collection. It is mandatory to call dispose() method on any IccProfile object when it is no longer needed in order to free all native resources and avoid memory leaks.

    • Constructor Detail

      • IccProfile

        public IccProfile(int id)
           throws JCMSException
        Constructs an IccProfile object for a predefined standard ICC profile.
        Parameters:
        id - Id for the standard ICC profile (constants IccProfile.PROFILE_*)
        Throws:
        JCMSException - If the standard profile can not be generated

      • IccProfile

        public IccProfile(java.io.File file)
           throws JCMSException
        Constructs an IccProfile object based on data contained in a file.
        Parameters:
        file - File with ICC profile data (usually .icm or .icc extension)
        Throws:
        JCMSException - When unable to load ICC profile data from this file

      • IccProfile

        public IccProfile(byte[] data)
           throws JCMSException
        Constructs an IccProfile object based on data contained in a memory buffer.
        Parameters:
        data - Memory buffer with complete data of the ICC profile
        Throws:
        JCMSException - When unable to load ICC profile data from this memory buffer
